languages.text: "Сложно сказать, сколько еще страданий придется вынести ее душе прежде, чем мы покинем этот город. Быть может, по пути ее даже сожрет Сай'лантреш, ведь в подобной форме наши души столь хрупки и беззащитны... Но если ты считаешь, что есть шанс ее спасти — я не буду препятствовать".

traits.locale_text: "Сложно сказать, сколько еще страданий придется вынести ее душе прежде, чем мы покинем этот город. Быть может, по пути ее даже сожрет Сай'лантреш, ведь в подобной форме наши души столь хрупки и беззащитны... Но ты считаешь, что если шанс ее спасти — я не буду препятствовать".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."
languages.original_text: "Сложно сказать, сколько еще страданий придется вынести ее душе прежде, чем мы покинем этот город. Быть может, по пути ее даже сожрет Сай'лантреш, ведь в подобной форме наши души столь хрупки и беззащитны... Но если ты считаешь, что есть шанс ее спасти — я не буду препятствовать".

She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Es difícil saber cuánto sufrimiento le queda aún por padecer a esta alma antes de que nos marchemos de esta ciudad. Incluso podría ser devorada por Sai'lanthresh durante el camino, ya que en estas formas nuestras almas se vuelven frágiles e indefensas... Pero si crees que cabe alguna posibilidad de salvarla, no me interpondré».
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil saber cuánto sufrimiento le queda aún por padecer a esta alma antes de que nos marchemos de esta ciudad. Incluso podría ser devorada por Sai'lanthresh durante el camino, ya que en estas formas nuestras almas se vuelven frágiles e indefensas... Pero si crees que cabe alguna posibilidad de salvarla, no me interpondré».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「この街を出るまでに、彼女の魂がどれほどの苦しみに耐えることになるかはわからない。途中でセランスレッシュに喰われてしまうかもしれない。このような姿では、我々の魂はとても脆く無防備になってしまうのだから…だが、もし彼女を救える可能性があるとあなたが思うなら、邪魔はしない」
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: 「この街を出るまでに、彼女の魂がどれほどの苦しみに耐えることになるかはわからない。途中でセランスレッシュに喰われてしまうかもしれない。このような姿では、我々の魂はとても脆く無防備になってしまうのだから…だが、もし彼女を救える可能性があるとあなたが思うなら、邪魔はしない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “在我们离开这座城市之前，我说不好她的灵魂还要忍受多少痛苦。她说不定会在半路就被赛·兰斯雷什吞噬。当我们的灵魂处于这种形态时非常脆弱，毫无抵抗之力……不过，既然你认为她还有一线生机，那我不会反对。”
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: “在我们离开这座城市之前，我说不好她的灵魂还要忍受多少痛苦。她说不定会在半路就被赛·兰斯雷什吞噬。当我们的灵魂处于这种形态时非常脆弱，毫无抵抗之力……不过，既然你认为她还有一线生机，那我不会反对。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il est difficile de dire quelles souffrances son âme va encore devoir endurer avant que nous ne quittions la ville. Elle sera peut-être même dévorée par Sai'lanthresh en chemin, car les formes telles que la sienne rendent nos âmes très fragiles et vulnérables... Mais si vous pensez que nous avons une chance de la sauver, je ne vous arrêterai pas. »
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: « Il est difficile de dire quelles souffrances son âme va encore devoir endurer avant que nous ne quittions la ville. Elle sera peut-être même dévorée par Sai'lanthresh en chemin, car les formes telles que la sienne rendent nos âmes très fragiles et vulnérables... Mais si vous pensez que nous avons une chance de la sauver, je ne vous arrêterai pas. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist schwer zu sagen, wie viel Leid ihre Seele noch ertragen muss, bevor wir die Stadt verlassen. Vielleicht wird sie mit der Zeit auch von Sai'lanthresh verschlungen, denn in diesem Zustand ist die Seele sehr zerbrechlich und wehrlos ... Aber wenn Ihr meint, dass die Chance besteht, sie zu retten, soll es an mir nicht scheitern."
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwer zu sagen, wie viel Leid ihre Seele noch ertragen muss, bevor wir die Stadt verlassen. Vielleicht wird sie mit der Zeit auch von Sai'lanthresh verschlungen, denn in diesem Zustand ist die Seele sehr zerbrechlich und wehrlos ... Aber wenn Ihr meint, dass die Chance besteht, sie zu retten, soll es an mir nicht scheitern."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu şehirden ayrılmadan ruhunun daha ne kadar eziyete dayanabileceğini kestirmek zor. Sai'lanthresh, yolda onu tüketebilir. Zira böylesi biçimler, ruhlarımızı bir hayli kırılgan ve savunmasız bırakır. Fakat kurtulabilme şansı olduğunu düşünüyorsan sana engel olmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "It is hard to say how much more suffering her soul has yet to endure before we leave this city. She may even be devoured by Sai'lanthresh on the way, as forms like these make our souls very brittle and defenceless... But if you think there is a chance she can be saved, I will not stand in the way."

traits.locale_text: "Bu şehirden ayrılmadan ruhunun daha ne kadar eziyete dayanabileceğini kestirmek zor. Yola çıktığımızda Sai'lanthresh onu silip süpürebilir bile. Çünkü böylesi biçimler, ruhlarımızı bir hayli kırılgan ve savunmasız bırakır. Fakat kurtulabilme şansı olduğunu düşünüyorsan sana engel olmayacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
